outputs.output_descr: Capacity of national institutions to lead and coordinate the national HIV response strengthened; National and local government capacity to mainstream HIV  and AIDS in planning and policy processes improved; Institutional capacity for resources tracking strengthened; National capacity to gather and disseminate strategic information strengthened; Capacity of the UN JT to plan, implement, monitor and evaluate the JUPSA strengthened; Capacity of national institutions to identify and implement relevant laws, policies and practices that undermine and support effective responses to HIV and AIDS strengthened; Legislative environment for HIV prevention, care and treatment strengthened; The accelerated National Action  Plan of action on women, girls, and gender equality on HIV  and AIDS implemented.

project_descr: Joint UN HIV/AIDS programme to lead and coordinate the national HIV response
